description: Explore game concepts through Mechanics-Dynamics-Aesthetics lens to ensure cohesive design from implementation to player experience
facilitation_prompts: What mechanics create the core loop?|What dynamics emerge from these mechanics?|What aesthetic experience results?|How do they align?

description: Design the fundamental moment-to-moment gameplay loop that players repeat - the heartbeat of your game
facilitation_prompts: What does the player do?|What's the immediate reward?|Why do it again?|How does it evolve?

description: Identify and amplify the core fantasy that players want to embody - what makes them feel powerful and engaged
facilitation_prompts: What fantasy does the player live?|What makes them feel awesome?|What power do they wield?|What identity do they assume?

description: Combine unexpected game genres to create innovative hybrid experiences that offer fresh gameplay
facilitation_prompts: Take two unrelated genres|How do they merge?|What unique gameplay emerges?|What's the hook?

description: Focus on what players DO before what things ARE - prioritize actions over objects for engaging gameplay
facilitation_prompts: What verbs define your game?|What actions feel good?|Build mechanics from verbs|Nouns support actions

description: Work backwards from interesting failure conditions to create tension and meaningful choices
facilitation_prompts: How can players fail interestingly?|What makes failure feel fair?|How does failure teach?|Recovery mechanics?

description: Map the player's emotional and skill journey from tutorial to mastery - pace challenge and revelation
facilitation_prompts: How does difficulty evolve?|When do we introduce concepts?|What's the skill ceiling?|How do we maintain flow?

description: Design simple rule interactions that create complex unexpected player-driven outcomes
facilitation_prompts: What simple rules combine?|What emerges from interactions?|How do players surprise you?|Systemic possibilities?

description: Brainstorm how different skill levels and abilities can access your core experience meaningfully
facilitation_prompts: Who might struggle with what?|What alternate inputs exist?|How do we preserve challenge?|Inclusive design options?

description: Design the timing and type of rewards to maintain player motivation and engagement
facilitation_prompts: What rewards when?|Variable or fixed schedule?|Intrinsic vs extrinsic rewards?|Progression satisfaction?

description: Align story and gameplay so mechanics reinforce narrative themes - make meaning through play
facilitation_prompts: What does gameplay express?|How do mechanics tell story?|Where do they conflict?|How to unify theme?

description: Use world design and ambient details to convey narrative without explicit exposition
facilitation_prompts: What does the space communicate?|What happened here before?|Visual narrative clues?|Show don't tell?

description: Identify key deinnovationion points where player choice shapes narrative in meaningful ways
facilitation_prompts: What choices matter?|How do consequences manifest?|Branch vs flavor choices?|Meaningful agency where?

description: Design specific moments intended to evoke targeted emotional responses through integrated design
facilitation_prompts: What emotion when?|How do all elements combine?|Music + mechanics + narrative?|Orchestrated feelings?

description: Explore resource generation/consumption balance to prevent game-breaking exploits
facilitation_prompts: What resources exist?|Generation vs consumption rates?|What loops emerge?|Where's the exploit?

description: Brainstorm progression systems that persist beyond individual play sessions
facilitation_prompts: What carries over between sessions?|Long-term goals?|How does meta feed core loop?|Retention hooks?

description: Anticipate how players will interact and design mechanics that support desired social behaviors
facilitation_prompts: How will players cooperate?|Competitive dynamics?|Toxic behavior prevention?|Positive interaction rewards?

description: Consider how watching others play can be entertaining - esports and streaming potential
facilitation_prompts: What's fun to watch?|Readable visual clarity?|Highlight moments?|Narrative for observers?

description: Embrace a specific limitation as your core design constraint and build everything around it
facilitation_prompts: Pick a severe constraint|What if this was your ONLY mechanic?|Build a full game from limitation|Constraint as creativity catalyst

description: Focus purely on how controls and feedback FEEL before worrying about context or goals
facilitation_prompts: What feels juicy to do?|Controller response?|Visual/audio feedback?|Satisfying micro-interactions?

description: Design interesting gameplay using only a single input - forces elegant simplicity
facilitation_prompts: Only one button - what can it do?|Context changes meaning?|Timing variations?|Depth from simplicity?

description: Take a well-known game and twist one core element - what new experience emerges?
facilitation_prompts: Pick a famous game|Change ONE fundamental rule|What ripples from that change?|New game from mutation?

description: Design a game that deliberately breaks common conventions - subvert player expectations
facilitation_prompts: What if we broke this rule?|Expectation subversion?|Anti-patterns as features?|Avant-garde possibilities?

description: Start with an interesting physics interaction and build a game around that sensation
facilitation_prompts: What physics are fun to play with?|Build game from physics toy|Emergent physics gameplay?|Sensation first?

description: Create a playful interactive toy with no goals first - then discover the game within it
facilitation_prompts: What's fun to mess with?|No goals yet - just play|What game emerges organically?|Toy to game evolution?
